pageContext.claim: “We have it under very good control. Turkey has done what we’ve asked them to do [in Syria]. ”
pageContext.analysis: The ceasefire was only required because Trump suddenly withdrew U.S. forces from the Syrian border, causing the power balance in the area and in the conflict to shift dramatically. President Trump asked the Turkish president not to “slaughter thousands of people,” after he seemingly gave a green light to Turkey’s operation. On either front, it’s tough to imagine Turkey’s action were “exactly” what the U.S. hoped they would be.
